involvedParties: St. Paul Fire & Marine Jins. Co.
St. Paul Fire & Marine Jins. Co. v. Barr.reasoning: The one case in which we have found an activity to con- stitute  a  "boycott"  within  the meaning  of the  McCarran- Ferguson Act

United States v. South-Eastern Underwrit.reasoning: A classic boycott, by primary insurers, of competitors who refused to join their price-fixing conspiracy

L. Sullivan, Law of Antitrust.reasoning: Such concerted agreements do "not coerc[e] anyone, at least in the usual sense of that word"
